name: Still Green Sorrow of a lost child (DEMO)
name_original: Still Green Sorrow of a lost child (DEMO)
description: This game is a Visual Novel demo about an 8 years old girl named Lua Takizawa. in a journey of reviving good memories about her deceased mother. In this world, everyone has his own “Onishiki” (Oni + Ishiki= Consciousness demon) a physical manifestation of a person ID. This demo shows some decisions and story elements of the first one of the three days, and her objective is to throw flowers in the Nakatajima Beach in the third day.
